title: What is Information and Communication Technology (ICT)? How Information and Communication Technology (ICT) can improve teaching learning in the classroom. What are the possible disadvantages of using information technology in classroom? - Quora

response.answer_text: ICT is just another tool a teacher can use - you could as well say how useful is a teacher’s voice. A good teacher can use ICT to overcome other limitations but it may also be a barrier. Teachers need an education system that allows them to see opportunities and share good practice using ICT and the time to prepare or else there needs to be a third party that can do so. For example, consider a volcano. ICT gives various ways to demonstrate what is happening from video to animations created by knowledgeable geologists. A normal classroom would rarely provide a useful alternative.
